welcome.welcome: Welcome to bnap400! Let's answer a couple questions to get started!
welcome.confignote: The config file is located in ~/.bnap/config.json if you ever need to change something.
welcome.library: Music library location (leave blank for default)
welcome.nerdfont: Do you want Nerd Font icons? This requires a Nerd Font! (y/N)
welcome.complete: Setup complete! Press enter to start bnap4000.
